snippet: The Mostly Mozart Festival’s concert on Tuesday evening at Avery Fisher Hall included works by Alfred Schnittke, Haydn and Mozart.
abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews classical music concert featuring works by Alfred Schnittke, Haydn and Mozart, performed by Mostly Mozart Festival Orchestra, at Avery Fisher Hall as part of Mostly Mozart Festival.
lead_paragraph: The Mostly Mozart Festival’s concert on Tuesday evening at Avery Fisher Hall included works by Alfred Schnittke, Haydn and Mozart.

headline.seo: Work by Schnittke and Haydn at Mostly Mozart
headline.main: In Homage to Mozart, Musical Wit and Allusions
headline.print_headline: In Homage to Mozart, Musical Wit and Allusions
